snippet: As the prognosis grows more bleak, a study finds, family members begin to misinterpret what doctors are trying to tell them.
abstract: As the prognosis grows more bleak, a study finds, family members begin to misinterpret what doctors are trying to tell them.
lead_paragraph: You’re the surrogate charged with making decisions for an incapacitated loved one in the intensive care unit of a California hospital. You’ve also agreed to be part of a study on how such decision-makers interpret information about how patients will fare.

headline.main: Weighing the Chances at Life’s End
